gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Jazz 125, Nets 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Jazz defeated the Nets, 125-108.  Talen Horton-Tucker (season-high 27 points) and Collin Sexton (27 points, six assists) combined for 54 points for the Jazz in the victory, while Cam Thomas led all scorers with 32 points and five 3PM for the Nets in the losing effort.  The Jazz improve to 10-17 on the season, while the Nets fall to 13-13.
